ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 98
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, Sneak will stay on forever, once it succeeds. You need to manually click on it again to turn it off. Maekew Date: Thu, 10 Jun 1999 12:43:22 -0400
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, Sneak will stay on forever, once it succeeds. You need to
manually click on it again to turn it off.

Maekew

Date: Thu, 10 Jun 1999 12:43:22 -0400
From: "John Rice" <johnrice@...>
Subject: bug with Sneak?


I have trained up my sneak skill somewhat but am having trouble
using it. It stays in the depressed position all the time. So
far I was able to use it once. Is it something bards can only
use once a week? Does it have to be above a certain level to
be able to use it? Anyone know the deal?

Berk
Level 23 bard on Rallos Zek
